<style>
:root { --news-blue:#0d6efd; --news-line:#9bb9ff; }

.news-wrap{max-width:980px;margin:0 auto;padding:0 12px;}
.news-intro{margin:22px auto 8px;font-size:1.05rem;line-height:1.8;color:#333;font-family:system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;}
.news-badge{display:inline-block;font-size:.78rem;padding:.2em .6em;border-radius:999px;background:#f5f9ff;border:1px solid #d8e2f1;color:#0b3d91;}

.project-card{
  border:1px solid #e7ebf3;border-radius:14px;padding:1rem 1.1rem;background:#fff;
  box-shadow:0 4px 18px rgba(0,0,0,.04);
}
.project-card .btn{margin-top:.25rem;}

.btn{
  display:inline-flex;align-items:center;gap:.42em;padding:.52rem .9rem;border-radius:10px;
  border:1px solid #d6e4ff;text-decoration:none;background:#f5f9ff;color:#0b3d91;font-weight:600;
}
.btn:hover{background:#eef5ff;border-color:#c8dafc;color:#08347a;text-decoration:none;}

/* Make Quarto columns equal height */
.columns > .column{ display:flex; }
.columns > .column > .project-card{ display:flex; flex-direction:column; height:100%; }

/* Timeline */
.news-tl{ --datew:120px; --dot: var(--news-blue); }
.news-tl-year{ font-weight:800; font-size:1.2rem; color:#2c3e50; margin:28px 0 10px; }

.news-tl-list{
  display:grid;
  grid-template-columns: var(--datew) 28px 1fr;
  row-gap:16px;
  position:relative;
}

/* Strong, always-visible vertical line */
.news-tl-list::before{
  content:"";
  position:absolute;
  top:0; bottom:0;
  left: calc(var(--datew) + 14px); /* center of the 28px dot column */
  width:3px;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg,
    rgba(13,110,253,.35) 0%,
    rgba(13,110,253,.45) 20%,
    rgba(13,110,253,.45) 80%,
    rgba(13,110,253,.35) 100%);
  border-radius:2px;
  box-shadow:0 0 0 1px rgba(13,110,253,.08);
}

.news-tl-item{ display:contents; }
.news-tl-date{
  grid-column:1; align-self:start; justify-self:end; text-align:right; padding-right:12px;
  font-weight:700; color:var(--dot); font-size:.95rem;
}
.news-tl-dot{
  grid-column:2; width:14px; height:14px; border-radius:50%; border:3px solid var(--dot); background:#fff;
  justify-self:center; align-self:start; margin-top:.6rem; box-shadow:0 0 0 3px rgba(13,110,253,.12);
}
.news-tl-card{ grid-column:3; }

@media (max-width:740px){ .news-tl{ --datew:98px; } .news-tl-list{ grid-template-columns: var(--datew) 26px 1fr; } }
@media (max-width:480px){ .news-tl{ --datew:86px; } .news-tl-date{ font-size:.9rem; } .news-tl-list{ grid-template-columns: var(--datew) 24px 1fr; } }
</style>
